name: nova-vscode
description: Nova Java language support powered by nova-lsp

nova.server.path.description: Override the nova-lsp binary path. When set, Nova will not download or manage the server.

nova.server.autoDownload.description: Prompt to download the Nova server automatically when it is missing.

nova.server.releaseChannel.description: Which GitHub release channel to use when nova.server.version is "latest".

nova.server.version.description: The nova-lsp version to install (e.g. "0.1.0" or "v0.1.0") or "latest".

nova.server.releaseUrl.description: GitHub repository URL (or "owner/repo") to download nova-lsp releases from.

nova.lsp.configPath.description: Path to a Nova TOML config file to pass to nova-lsp via --config.

nova.lsp.extraArgs.description: Additional command-line arguments to pass to nova-lsp.

nova.ai.enabled.description: Master toggle for Nova AI features. When disabled, the extension will not request or surface AI completions.

nova.aiCompletions.enabled.description: Enable Nova AI multi-token completions via nova/completion/more.

nova.aiCompletions.maxItems.description: Maximum number of AI completion items to request.

nova.aiCompletions.requestTimeoutMs.description: Max wall-clock time (ms) to poll nova/completion/more for async AI completions.

nova.aiCompletions.pollIntervalMs.description: Base polling interval (ms) for nova/completion/more. Nova uses a short exponential backoff derived from this value.

scripts.test: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('out', { recursive: true, force: true })" && npm run compile && node --test out/__tests__/aiCompletionMore.node.js out/__tests__/lspArgs.node-test.js && vitest run
scripts.package: npm run sync-version && npm run compile && node scripts/ensure-dist.mjs && vsce package --skip-license --out dist/nova.vsix
